rubberworks.hint.compressor.heat: It appears that this Compressor has _not enough heat_
rubberworks.hint.compressor.heat.title: Heat Requirement:
rubberworks.hint.compressor.reverse: It appears that this Compressor is rotating in the _wrong direction_.
rubberworks.hint.sapper.full.title: Internal Tank Full
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.header: Using a compressor to process fluids
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.text_1: The Compressor can process fluids into items
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.text_2: It can be powered with a shaft from the side
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.text_3: It must move clockwise from the right side
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.text_4: Fluids can be inserted from the back
rubberworks.ponder.compressor.text_6: Lastly, the output can be retrieved with a depot, belt or basin
rubberworks.ponder.sapper.header: Using a sapper to gather resources
rubberworks.ponder.sapper.text_1: Sappers are machines used to sap fluids from trees
rubberworks.ponder.sapper.text_2: You can power them with cogs
rubberworks.ponder.sapper.text_3: And then pull the output fluids from the back
